body: yeah that makes a lot more sense

@randomman101010. Nah, that's wrong. Netori is when the (f)MC is the one stealing other's LI. Netorare is when the (f)MC got their LI stolen by someone else. In this case, it's netorare since the MC got stolen from the fMC by her friends. Would've been netori if the friends were going out with someone else and either MCs made the move on them.
What could've happened if Nagatoro didn't snap back to reality

short girl (fmc) has a crush on her childhood friend (mc) but instead of being nice to him she make him her errand boy. fmc's friend A fuck mc while he was buying things for fmc and this made him late. fmc is angry and mc having enough of her shit fought back.fmc left the classroom angry and fmc's friend B fuck mc just after fmc left and friend A also joins and they have a threesome. after her club ends, fmc thought she should be nicer to mc and wanted to apologize the next day but then, she saw mc and her friends fucking in the classroom.
